actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 107-21.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 56.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a former Bureau of Land Management administrative site to the City of Carson City, Nevada, for use as a senior center.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the Bureau of Land Management, to convey to Carson City, Nevada, specified Bureau lands in Carson City for use as a senior assisted living center or a related public purpose.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a former Bureau of Land Management administrative site to the City of Carson City, Nevada, for use as a senior center.
